name: Water Slide Superhero Game
description:
Let’s begin the crazy waterslide 3D adventure fun. Play this water slide adventure with your favorite superheroes. Slide on seven different waterslide and get ready for a big water park game splash this season. Start crazy human roller coaster with flying superhero spider and his friends. Summer season is still here so slide your way down to the big pool playing best waterslide game. Collect multiple coins on the water park slide adventure, twist and turn your super hero to gain top score. Reach the incredible speed & extreme velocity to enjoy this water slide game.

This game is a blend of your favorite superheroes in water slide adventure. Epic water slides with coin collecting and swimming missions is a treat for super hero games lover. Become the best slider of venture games.

Features:
5 Amazing missions.
Epic water park environments.
7 awesome slides.
Coolest water park game.
Mesmerizing 3D Adventure graphics.

Download and play this Game. Do give us your reviews.
